item.title: NEW UPDATE as of February 1st! Current Version is 2.1.19 Check out the TUTORIAL SECTION on the menu to show you how to get the most out of your firestick!
For videos on how to how to update, add HD sports, or work your Kodi go to bit.ly/rbfsyoutube
Updating is OPTIONAL, but there are always new things being added so like and subscribe at bit.ly/rbfsyoutube
